Reviews.Title: Excellent buy by Amazon
Reviews.Author: horrorsapiens
Reviews.Content: The MINOX DCC camera has arrived with not any problem and in perfect state of use. I have not any disclaim.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Andrew Jackson "Celticson"
Reviews.Content: Not only was this poor quality, like a plastic toy, it did not work after fully charging the battery.  If you purchase, you are making a mistake.  I had to return it, and if it was $9.95, then maybe I would purchase it.

Reviews.Title: nothing but looks
Reviews.Author: PENGFEIWEN(SHELBY)
Reviews.Content: this even can not called a camera ，pictures are worse than my iphone，no shake proof ，color is not good either

ProductInfo.Features:
Classic German Rangefinder Design
24K Gold-Plated
Detachable Viewfinder & Brass Lens Cap
Camera Weighs Less Than 4 Oz
Camera Measures Just 2.9x1.8x1.7"
ProductInfo.Name: Minox DCC 5.1 Gold Edition Digital Camera 60672
